ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (NOT($Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption) && ISPICKVAL(Account.Delinquency_Status__c, 'Quotes Approved') && Probability > 0.35 )&& TEXT(Type) != 'Exchange' && TEXT(Type) != 'Warranty Exchange' && TEXT(Type) != 'Remorse Refund' && TEXT(Type)!= 'Promo Opportunity'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This Account is blocked due to delinquency. Please reach out to Finance for additional information!
